error.message: Mandatory header not found.
Constant _badly_named_constant name should follow the pattern /^[A-Z][A-Z0-9_]*$/.

Top level variable $X name should follow the pattern /^[a-z_][a-zA-Z0-9]*$/.

Member variable $Y name should follow the pattern /^[a-z_][a-zA-Z0-9]*$/.
The constructor name must be badlynamedclass.
Function Badlynamedfunction name should follow the pattern /^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$/.
Local variable $Z name should follow the pattern /^[a-z_][a-zA-Z0-9]*$/.
Protected function Badlynamedfunction2 name should follow the pattern /^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$/.
Private function badlynamedfunction3 name should follow the pattern /^_[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$/.
Interface _badlynamedinterface name should follow the pattern /^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$/.
File _bad_naming_12.php name should follow the pattern /^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9._]*$/.

chop is an alias, consider replacing with rtrim().
fputs is an alias, consider replacing with fwrite().
die is an alias, consider replacing with exit().

Mandatory header not found.
split is deprecated since PHP 5.3. explode($pattern, $string) or preg_split('@'.$pattern.'@', $string) must be used instead.
ereg is deprecated since PHP 5.3. preg_match('@'.$pattern.'@', $string) must be used instead.
session_register is deprecated since PHP 5.3. $_SESSION must be used instead.
mysql_db_query is deprecated since PHP 5.3. mysql_select_db and mysql_query must be used instead.
$HTTP_GET_VARS is deprecated since PHP 5.3. $_GET must be used instead.
